remarks: Value of a double involution.  Part 1.2 of [Baer] p. 110 line 37. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapvv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapvv.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvv.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapvv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapvv.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapvv.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapvv.j $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
hgmapvv $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` ( G ` X ) ) = X ) $.
